Module ing.sw.puddu.rios.rizzo
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.middleware

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.middleware.Messenger
      • it.polimi.ingsw.view.middleware.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControllerInterface, NetworkInterface, java.lang.Runnable
    public class Client
extends Messenger
implements ControllerInterface, java.lang.Runnable, NetworkInterface
    The client node in the client-server network architecture of the game.

      • run

        public void run()
        Handles the messages coming from the stream (the server), de-serializing and calling callMethod. Creates and runs the thread responsible to send "pong" messages to the server, to notify the client aliveness.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
